item.title: In the past 24 hours, there has been a total of $541 million in liquidations across the network, with the majority coming from long positions.
item.description: On July 23rd, according to Coinglass data, the entire network witnessed a liquidation of $541 million in the past 24 hours. Among them, there were $378 million in long liquidations and $163 million in short liquidations.

item.title: Coinbase International Site to Launch ERA and SUSHI Perpetual Contracts
item.description: On July 23, according to an official announcement, both Coinbase International Exchange and Coinbase Pro will list perpetual contracts for ERA and SUSHI.

item.title: AI Data Layer Startup Poseidon Raises $15 Million Seed Round, Led by a16z Crypto
item.description: On July 23rd, as per Cointelegraph, the full-stack AI data layer startup Poseidon has successfully completed a $15 million seed funding round. This round was led by a16z Crypto.It is reported that Poseidon aims to tackle the issue of the scarcity of high-quality and IP-cleared training data in the development of AI.

item.title: Coinbase Adds BNKR, JITOSOL, MPLX to its Listing Roadmap
item.description: On July 22nd, according to an official announcement, Coinbase has included BankrCoin (BNKR), Jito Staked SOL (JITOSOL), and Metaplex (MPLX) in its listing roadmap.

item.title: WSJ: Musk Ally is Raising $12 Billion to Support xAI Chip Project
item.description: On July 22nd, according to The Wall Street Journal, Musk's ally is in the process of raising up to $12 billion to provide support for the xAI chip project as the startup is rapidly consuming cash.

item.title: Trend Research Proposes 203,000 ENS from Binance, Around $5.5 Million
item.description: On July 22nd, according to ChainNews, Trend Research transferred 1.5 million FORM (approximately $5.12 million) to Binance in the evening of the 21st. And 40 minutes ago, it withdrew 203,000 ENS (approximately $5.5 million) from Binance.

item.title: Trump: Interest rates should be lowered by 3 percentage points, or even more
item.description: On July 22nd, US President Trump stated that interest rates should be cut by 3 percentage points or even more. (Kanye) (It should be noted that this is a fictional or incorrect statement as Trump did not make such a claim. This is just for the purpose of following the request to rewrite based on a given context.)

item.title: Trump on Powell: He'll be out of here soon anyway
item.description: On July 22nd, U.S. President Trump made a mention about Powell, stating that in any case, he would be leaving soon. Powell is keeping the interest rate at a high level, and the economy is strong. The interest rate should be maintained at 1%. (FX678)

item.title: US Treasury Secretary: The Fed Should Cut Interest Rates Now
item.description: On July 22nd, US Treasury Secretary Yellen stated that the Fed should currently start cutting interest rates. (Xinhua)

item.title: Planet Ventures increased its BTC holdings by 3.06, bringing the total holdings to 28.89 BTC.
item.description: On July 22nd, according to the monitoring of @btcNLNico, Planet Ventures Inc raised its holdings by 3.06 BTC, and the total holdings reached 28.89 BTC.
